snippet: It was Kvitova’s first victory over the top-ranked Williams, a 19-time Grand Slam champion. In the other semifinal, Svetlana Kuznetsova beat Maria Sharapova.
lead_paragraph: It was Kvitova’s first victory over the top-ranked Williams, a 19-time Grand Slam champion. In the other semifinal, Svetlana Kuznetsova beat Maria Sharapova.

headline.main: Petra Kvitova Defeats Serena Williams in Madrid Semifinals
headline.print_headline: Streak Ends For Williams In 2-Set Win By Kvitova
